subject: Dear Client
body:
Dear Client
 We are Glad you received the first Payment.
 We are now ready to send the second payment. Please we need
re-confirmation from you via email.
So we can send the second Payment.
Regards
Rep. First Financial Credit Union
     UN/IMF/ECOWAS
Tel: 7578028190

subject: Re:   Dear Client
body:
Dear Rep. First Financial Credit Union,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm glad to hear that the first payment was received successfully. I would be happy to provide you with the information you need via email. Could you please let me know what specific details you require from me in order to process the second payment?

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ethan

subject: Re: Re:   Dear Client
body:
You got the first payment right? 

-- 
Sent from my Android phone with mail.com Mail. Please excuse my brevity. (http://mail.com)

subject: Re: Re:   Dear Client
body:
Hello there! Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what payment you're referring to. Could you please provide me with more details?

Best wishes,
Ethan

subject: Re: Re: Re:   Dear Client
body:
You just said you received it seems you people that are at freedomgissip are just jokers 

-- 
Sent from my Android phone with mail.com Mail. Please excuse my brevity. (http://mail.com)

subject: Re: Re: Re:   Dear Client
body:
Hello there! I hope you're having a great day. I understand that you may have some concerns, but I assure you that I'm here to help and provide information. Could you please let me know what specifically made you think we are jokers? I'd be happy to address any doubts or questions you may have.

Best wishes,
Ethan
